entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
